Downtown Southside Shuttle

DS Outbound Description:

The Downtown Southside Outbound leaves campus and travels through Vestal Avenue, Conklin Avenue, & Tompkins Street in Southside Binghamton, and Court, Henry, & State Streets in Downtown Binghamton, while also making stops at UClub - University Plaza, Mirabito Stadium, & the BC Junction Bus Terminal enroute to the University Downtown Center.


DS Inbound Description:

The Downtown Southside Inbound leaves the University Downtown Center and travels through Court, Henry, & State Streets in Downtown Binghamton, and Vestal Avenue, Conklin Avenue, & Tompkins Street in Southside Binghamton, while also making stops at the BC Junction Bus Terminal, Mirabito Stadium, UClub - University Plaza, Meadows, and Hayes enroute back to campus.


Reminder: All Downtown Southside Inbound buses at the University Downtown Center return to campus.

DS Outbound

with service to:

• UClub - University Plaza

• Vestal Avenue, Conklin Avenue, & Tompkins Street in Southside Binghamton

• Mirabito Stadium & BC Junction Bus Terminal

• Court, Henry, & State Streets in Downtown Binghamton

• University Downtown Center in Downtown Binghamton

DS Inbound

with service to:

• State, Henry, and Court Streets in Downtown Binghamton

• BC Junction Bus Terminal and Mirabito Stadium

• Tompkins Street, Conklin Avenue, and Vestal Avenue in Southside Binghamton

• UClub - University Plaza, Meadows, and Hayes

• Binghamton University
